body:

title: smitdalt - AM(A)A

2. What languages do you know?

replies.body: How much wood can a woodchuck chuck if a wood chuck had no legs ?
replies.body_tagged: How much wood can a woodchuck chuck if a wood chuck had no legs ?

replies.body:
{tag=edb25878086b4e7db06233133fbc455e}

Depending on how much free time I have I'll put about 3 hours of work in a day.

{tag=bc592554bfc34c5993476bc1e46f58ea}

1. Have we ever met before you were promoted to a Junior Developer? Yes, but I don't think you want to know how LOL

2. What languages do you know? I know C#, Java, SQL, Python, PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, RoR, Lua, and a somewhat limited amount of c++.

3. Favourite food and beverage? My favorite food would have to be filet mignon and my favorite drink is pretty much any soda.
 
4. What's your vision of Avicus in the future? I have a lot of ideas, but I just hope we can rebuild a bigger community.

{tag=075b5514293a4bd5bcef367e687d3556}

How long have you been on Avicus? About 4 years, but I've taken a few breaks in that time.

How much do you want to ban Rilo every day? It's very hard to resist the temptation.

Do you even WAMP? I'll have you know I WAMPed for an entire summer.

How did you come up with burning pencils? Probably extreme boredom in chem

What are you studying in college? Software Engineering, not all that surprising.

{tag=e0429b4918464f298e40ee5762d90a46}

Yes, I do remember that. I also remember not being awful at this game, but that's a thing of the past.

{tag=1154d26dfa5d4c429a38aa3506d6ac7e}

7 woods

replies.body: Why do you refuse to answer the main question people wanted to ask you?
replies.body_tagged: Why do you refuse to answer the main question people wanted to ask you?

replies.body: I think it's an effortless question that really doesn't matter. Who cares what I think about them. If they really want to know they should pm me.
replies.body_tagged: I think it's an effortless question that really doesn't matter. Who cares what I think about them. If they really want to know they should pm me.

reply_to.body: Why do you refuse to answer the main question people wanted to ask you?
reply_to.body_tagged: Why do you refuse to answer the main question people wanted to ask you?

replies.body:
Smitty.

Remember me, Dynamo? Wow, it's been a long time. We had that fight and we just completely went out own way. It was me you and phyre. 

Phyre told me you went to college and were doing something with coding and now look at you. Junior Developer on Avicus. 

We used to play HCF back in the days.
